Package fi.tuni.prog3.sisu

Class mainWindowController

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.prog3.sisu.mainWindowController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class mainWindowController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Main controller class of the UI. Handles several user actions.

      Parameters:

      rp - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized

    • handleTreeItemClick

      public void handleTreeItemClick​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      The largest single operation method of the class handling the Sturcture of Studies. Builds the Treeview of the
      Structure of studies:
      • Recurses the Module structure of SisuItems
      • Adds courses to the tree checkin for duplicates
      • Sorts the TreeItem courses by course, modules by name
      • Indicates the selection with awesome check -mark

      Creates a WebView and provides information of the course.
      Handles the selection and information of
      Attainments of the chosen Course
      • Manages the Completed -checkbox according to the given/loaded information
      • Manages the Grade -choicebox accordin to the given/loaded information if the Course is graded
      • Manages the date of completin, restricting the selection from Autum of Start Year to now
      Parameters:
      event - of the mouse clicked on the Module/Course/Attainment pane

    • saveAttainment

      public void saveAttainment​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Saves the Attainment data. Gives feedback with disappearing, colored text of selection
      Parameters:
      event - of the mouse clicked on "Save" on the Attainment pane

    • initDegreeProgramme

      public void initDegreeProgramme() throws java.io.IOException
      Landing method whenn entering the Structure of studies tab. Clears the views, prepares information for the TreeView and starts the recursion, collapses the tree hides the Attainment pane and feendback text.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - on saving User data or reading info of degrees.

    • setMyProfile

      public void setMyProfile()
      Landing method when chosing the My Profile -tab. Sets up the Profile edition possibility, creates Pie, LineChart, degreeinformation and average/total credits views.
